text: Sharon Ventura, also known as She-Thing, is a supporting character in the Fantastic Four comics published by Marvel Comics. Created by Mike Carlin and Ron Wilson, the character first appeared in Thing #27 (September 1985). She is a superheroine turned wrestler who is the ex-girlfriend of Ben Grimm (The Thing). She has been a member of the Unlimited Class Wrestling Federation, Frightful Four, Fantastic Four, and the Thunderiders. Sharon is also one of the few individuals to be called Ms. Marvel. Category:Marvel Comics characters
title: Sharon Ventura
